properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ihaparamandu nivasinchuvaaru nee naamamuna Mokarinthuru mahima paraturu devuni Angeekarinchu prativaani jivhaa neeve Kristu vanuchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apaaramaina kriyalu cheyuchu mammella Paripaalinchu chunnaavu premagala prabhuvaa Paapini rakshimpa ihamuna karigi Goppa rakshana nitche{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aiguptinundi vidipinchina vaarine naluvadi Vatsaramulu nadipinchitivi kaachitivi Kanu paapaga unchi yunnavu maadiriga vaarin Nee aalochana goppadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paramunu therichi mannaa kuripinchi Andariki jeeva jalamitchitivi pondiri thrupti Neeyandu agni stambhamu megha stambhamunu Nityamu nadipinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thuphaanu regi niraasha paracha satruvu Maa madya chelaregaga mammulanu Rakshinchitivi vaaghdaanamulu neraverchi Neeve swastyamu nitchitivi{/lang-eng}
